attributes.comment:
The proposed fee increases are completely unreasonable considering the economic reality of the
majority of immigrants in the U.S. We should be encouraging people to become documented and
to complete the processes necessary to reside legally in the United States. People who arrive as
asylees or refugess, in addition to other immigrants who seek to reside legally in our country, will
simply not be able to pay these exorbitant fees. The result is a cruel Catch-22: remain illegally in
the U.S., or return to persecution and poverty in their home countries. Most will choose the first
option, thus exacerbating the problem of illegal immigrants in the United States.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Patricia Julianelle
